column1:
$(window).load(function() {    
        
        	var theWindow        = $(window),
        	    $bg              = $(""#bg""),
        	    aspectRatio      = $bg.width() / $bg.height();
        	    			    		
        	function resizeBg() {
        		
        		if ( (theWindow.width() / theWindow.height()) < aspectRatio ) {
        		    $bg
        		    	.removeClass()
        		    	.addClass('bgheight');
        		} else {
        		    $bg
        		    	.removeClass()
        		    	.addClass('bgwidth');
        		}
        					
        	}
        	                   			
        	theWindow.resize(resizeBg).trigger(""resize"");
    
    });
